name: Fix sprite pane glitching
description: Fixes a bug in the Scratch editor where scripts, costumes, and sounds can't be dragged and dropped into sprites without the sprites jumping around within the sprite pane.

potentialValues.name: Fix bug and disable sprite wobble

latestUpdate.temporaryNotice: This addon has been reworked and now fixes the sprite pane glitch without having to disable the wobble animation. If you still want to disable the wobble, there's a setting below.
